name: Tesla Asteroids
description:
Why? Well, this happened, so we made a game mod of Asteroids, changed the sprites, developed the game, published here for you to play.

Go play, tell us what you think.

How to play on Windows: 

Left/Right Arrow : Turn Left/Right

Up : Thrust

Space : Shoot

Z : Hyperspace

How to play on Mobile:

Left/Right Arrow : Turn Left/Right

Up : Thrust

Shoot : Shoot

Hyperspace : Hyperspace

Thanks to Kenney for the asteroids and other assets that was used

Develop By : Dihgg & Falme
